name: Ina'nis - Operation: Bonk-Bonk
description:
Hololive fangame - Ina's friends are acting up so she bonks them back to normal

Controls:

- Move: Arrow keys

- Basic attack: A

- Charge skill meter: Press S after hitting the enemy with basic attacks

- Spend skill meter: Press D after charging the skill meter

(I didn't test the mac or linux versions im sorrrryyyyy)
